titles.title: To temporarily suspend the duty on certain cathode-ray tubes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 6/10/1999--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2004, the duty on cathode-ray data- graphic tubes, with a phosphor dot screen pitch smaller than 0.4mm having a video display diagonal not exceeding 30cm.
